mapper.select: select v.id, v.real_vpc_id, v.name, v.type, v.display_name, v.description, v.status, v.user_id, v.region, v.monthly_price, v.host_amount, v.ip_amount, v.create_time, s.account userName from vpc_base_info v join sys_user s on v.user_id = s.id where v.id = #{id} limit 1

select i.id, i.real_vpc_id, i.name, i.type, i.display_name, i.description, i.status, i.user_id, i.region, i.monthly_price, i.host_amount, i.ip_amount, i.create_time from vpc_base_info i left join vpc_bind_host h on i.id = h.vpc_id and flag = 0 where h.host_id = #{hostId} limit 1

select vbi.id, vbi.real_vpc_id, vbi.name, vbi.type, vbi.display_name, vbi.description, vbi.status, vbi.user_id, vbi.region, vbi.monthly_price, vbi.host_amount, vbi.ip_amount, vbi.create_time, vbi.modified_time from vpc_base_info vbi left join terminal_user tu on vbi.user_id = tu.id join agent a on a.id = tu.belonging_id where a.id = #{agentId}
